    • COLOR_SERIALIZER

  • Method Details

    • deserialize

      T deserialize(Object o)
      Convert a JSON object into an object of type T. Intended to be overridden; the default implementation just casts the object, and so is only valid for settings of type String, JSONArray, JSONObject and primitive data types.
      Parameters:
      o - The stored JSON node, in any valid JSON type
      Returns:
      The corresponding object of type T

    • serialize

      Object serialize(T value)
      Convert an object of the target type to a JSON node. Intended to be overridden; the default implementation just casts the object, and so is only valid for settings of type String, JSONArray, JSONObject and primitive data types.
      Parameters:
      value - The data to serialize
      Returns:
      The data as a JSON node

    • of

      static <T> Serializer<T> of(Function<Object,T> deser, Function<T,Object> ser)

    • array

      default Serializer<T[]> array(IntFunction<T[]> generator)
      Transform a serializer for the type T into a serializer for the type List<T>, using a JSON array to store the values.
      Parameters:
      generator - An array constructor for the type T
      Returns:
      a list serializer

    • list

      default Serializer<List<T>> list()
      Transform a serializer for the type T into a serializer for the type List<T>, using a JSON array to store the values.
      Returns:
      a list serializer

    • set

      default Serializer<Set<T>> set()
      Transform a serializer for the type T into a serializer for the type Set<T>, using a JSON array to store the values.
      Returns:
      a set serializer

    • map

      default Serializer<Map<String,T>> map()
      Transform a serializer for the type T into a serializer for the type Map<String, T>, using a JSON object to store the mappings.
      Returns:
      a map serializer

    • opt

      default Serializer<Optional<T>> opt()
      Transform a serializer for the type T into a serializer for the type List<T>, using a JSON array to store the values.
      Returns:
      a list serializer
